org.jetel.util.crypto

Class CombinedDecryptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.util.crypto.CombinedDecryptor

  • public class CombinedDecryptor
extends java.lang.Object
    Data encryption class decrypting data using symmetric key decrypted by an asymmetric key.
    Since:
    06/11/10

                  throws java.security.GeneralSecurityException

        asymKey - Asymmetric key to be used to decrypt symmetric key.
